archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ADV011 Misuse of information systems
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The threat misuses legitimately assigned access privileges to perform unauthorised actions on information systems.
Assessment guidance: This threat event can include: - intentionally causing adverse system behaviour/performance - accessing information for which the threat is not authorised - stealing or misappropriating information - using authorised communication services (e.g. email and instant messaging) to carry out unauthorised activities (e.g. downloading or sending of obscene, discriminatory or harassing content) - committing fraud - modifying, tampering with or destroying information for which the threat was notÂ authorised - unauthorised disclosure of organisational information assets (e.g. intellectual property, customer details or personally identifiable information).
